text: @JoeBiden So did Nancy Pelosi, Andrew Cuomo, Bill DeBlasio, and all the people we look to for information... you know why? Cause China LIED about the Chinese Coronavirus and if they hadn't then we wouldn't be in this mess.... it's not Trumps fault, it's Chinas #ChineseVirus #Coronavirus
